content.raw:
I’ve done some reworking of the EO output class. It now uses a shared StandardItemModel for data storage more directly. 

I’ve also allowed for the ability to define tooltips for enum options in the ComboBox pull-down menu, made the EO output respect the `‘default’ ` definition, and made some other minor tweaks to the look of the EO class.

As for respecting `'default'` values in properties, I’ve decided to just commit and modify the AO/DO/EO classes to accept a `default_value` kwarg. For AO/DO this kwarg is optional for backwards compatibility.

Still to do:

1. Final decision on programming workflow.
2. Decide on and Implement meta\_class
